Original title: The Anderson Tapes
Year: 1971
95 min.
Country: United States
Director: Sidney Lumet
Screenplay: Frank R. Pierson (Novel: Lawrence Sanders)
Music: Quincy Jones
Photography: Arthur J. Ornitz
Starring: Sean Connery, Dyan Cannon, Martin Balsam, Ralph Meeker, Christopher Walken, Alan King
Studio: Columbia Pictures
Genre: Mystery | Heist

Synopsis
Duke Anderson is a thief who just turned a sentence of ten years imprisonment. He meets his old girlfriend Ingrid in your apartment to prepare the theft of an entire building. What we know is that, although not under police surveillance, his every move is being recorded.
